short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: But you didn't have to cut me off (like that) -music intensifies-

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension plays the "Galaxy Brain Meme" when opened. Combining this with the Keyboard Shortcuts feature, you can emphasise the stupidity of any point your friends make.
